00062     public function Compile($format=GLST_FORMAT_C3) {
00063         $data = '';
00064         if($format != GLST_FORMAT_C3 && $format != GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00065             $format = $this->GuessFormat();
00066         }
00067         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00068             $data .= chr(0x27).pack('xxx');
00069         } else {
00070             $data .= chr(0x0C).pack('xxx');
00071         }
00072         $data .= pack('V',1);
00073         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker;
00074         $data .= pack('V',32).$this->moniker; //yeah, twice. Dunno why, CL are bonkers.
00075         $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->name)).$this->name;
00076         $data .= pack('VVVV',$this-gender,$this->genus,$this->species,count($this->events));
00077         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00078                 $data .= $event->Compile();
00079         }
00080         $data .= $this->unknown1;
00081         $data .= $this->unknown2;
00082         if($format == GLST_FORMAT_DS) {
00083             $data .= pack('V',$this->unknown3);
00084             $data .= pack('V',strlen($this->unknown4)).$this->unknown4;
00085         }
00086     }
00087     
00089 
00095     public function GuessFormat() {
00096         return (isset($this->unknown3))?GLST_FORMAT_DS:GLST_FORMAT_C3;
00097     }

00105         $this->events[] = $event;

00130     public function GetEventsByType($type) {
00131         $matchingEvents = array();
00132         foreach($this->events as $event) {
00133             if($event->GetEventType() == $type) {
00134                 $matchingEvents[] = $event;
00135             }
00136         }
00137         return $matchingEvents;
00138     }
